topics.name: Homework and Extension Activities

courseWork.title: 5/11 Homework Reading Response: Answer the following questions
courseWork.description:
What book did you read for homework?  
What was your book about?
Who is the main character?
What is the setting?
courseWork.descriptionHtml:
What book did you read for homework?
What was your book about?
Who is the main character?
What is the setting?

shortAnswerSubmission.answer: The book I read for homework was Fable-haven.  The main characters in the book were Kendra and Seth.  My book is about creatures of darkness being defeated by Kendra and Seth.  The setting is grandpas house.  Grandpa's house is small and is white.

topics.name: I Survived the Destruction of Pompeii Novel Study

form.title: I Survived he Destruction of Pompeii Novel Assessment

courseWork.title: I Survived he Destruction of Pompeii Novel Assessment
courseWork.description:
For the Novel Assessment you may use your book and any materials we have used throughout the Novel Study.
The following are not permitted for the assessment:
No Google/Internet Searching
No Partner/Classmate collaboration

Some questions are multiple choice or matching, these have 1 (one) correct answer

Some questions are short answer these require a 3 part text based answer: 
1)Restate the question
2) Use evidence from the text
3) CAPS

Some questions are essay questions these require a short paragraph in this format:
1)Topic sentence
2) Detail/Explanation Sentences
3) Closing sentence

***Read ALL Directions Carefully, there will be NO Makeups on this assessment***
courseWork.descriptionHtml:
For the Novel Assessment you may use your book and any materials we have used throughout the Novel Study.
The following are not permitted for the assessment:
No Google/Internet Searching
No Partner/Classmate collaboration

Some questions are multiple choice or matching, these have 1 (one) correct answer

Some questions are short answer these require a 3 part text based answer:
1)Restate the question
2) Use evidence from the text
3) CAPS

Some questions are essay questions these require a short paragraph in this format:
1)Topic sentence
2) Detail/Explanation Sentences
3) Closing sentence

***Read ALL Directions Carefully, there will be NO Makeups on this assessment***
